result.execSummary:
The defendant Clifford J. Thompson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Clifford J. Thompson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Clifford J. Thompson was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Clifford J. Thompson was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.

All financials same as noted above.  

DE must submit DNA sample.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Clifford J. Thompson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Clifford J. Thompson in court with attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea Questionnaire filed w/NC plea to Counts 2 & 3.  ADA White makes recommendation.  Court reviews rights, charges & penalties w/DE.  Court accepts waiver, plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Counts 2 & 3, dismisses Count 1.  Sentencing arguments.  DE addresses the Court.  Court follows recommendation, adds DNA surcharge and DE must submit sample.  Atty Haacke requests contact be allowed w/DE.  Court will leave it up to probation agent.  Appeal rights given to DE.

records.descr: Answer to demand for discovery and inspection

records.addlTxt: from DA to Atty Haacke re: Discovery

No appearance at first.  Commence forfeiture of prior bond.  $1,000 cash warrant requested and authorized.  Court willw ait until 1 p.m. to sign the warrant.

Defendant appears @ 11:53 a.m.  Defendant Clifford J. Thompson in court with attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court vacates prior warrant authorized.  Waive reading.  Defendant enters a plea of not guilty.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 09:15 am.

Defendant Clifford J. Thompson in court.  Gregory A. Parker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Right to counsel given - defendant wishes to speak with an attorney.  Defendant makes statement regarding counsel.  Has applied for public defender and may qualify.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 20, 2015 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Clifford J. Thompson

Prior: 815 Park Ave., Mattoon, WI 54450
Defendant is allowed contact with victim W.T.

Defendant Clifford J. Thompson in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DA won't make an offer because of the other pending charges.  Defendant wants contact with Whitney.  She is present in court and questioned by the Court.  DA objects to contact but court lifts the no contact order.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Pictures & prints.
No contact with W.T.
3rd party contact for visitation of child.

Defendant Clifford J. Thompson in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Right to counsel given - defendant wishes to speak with an attorney.  Has attempted to contact Gary Dodge.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 29, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
